For regular salaried workers  the employer‚Äôs contribution will start flowing into your CPF every month. If your MA is at near full BHS  the only opportunity to top up would be at the start of the year.

The key idea is that using VCMA to fill up your MA has advantages to using salary.1) VCMA contributions are not affected by SA shielding in future  RSTU contributions cannot be shielded.2) If you already hit FRS  you cannot use RSTU to offset taxes. VCMA is your only option.
